titles.title: TEAMS Act
To transition military veterans into new careers in education, and for other purposes.
TEAMS Act
Troops Educating And Managing Schools Act

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Armed Services, and in addition to the Committees on Education and Labor, the Judiciary, and Veterans' Affairs, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

Referred to the Subcommittee on Economic Opportunity.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime, Terrorism, and Homeland Security.

bill.summary: Troops Educating And Managing Schools Act or the TEAMS Act This bill renames the Troops-to-Teachers Program as the Veterans-to-Classrooms Program, expands the program to include recruitment of veterans to non-teaching positions such as positions for nurses, counselors, and school resource officers, and generally modifies the program's scope and related requirements.
